title: [Ceiluir Glade, Reflection Pool]
description: Bedecked with water lilies and their pads, the reflection pool is small and lined in cobalt tiles that give the cool waters a deep blue hue.  Lanterns housed in the boughs of an ancient oak tree illuminate various points along the pathway and reflect on the smooth surface of the water beneath them.  A row of sirenflowers bows their head as they sway in the gentle seaside breeze, occassionally chiming as they do, in reverence to the sunlight above.

Bedecked with water lilies and their pads, the reflection pool is small and lined in cobalt tiles that give the cool waters a deep blue hue.  Lanterns housed in the boughs of an ancient oak tree illuminate various points along the pathway and reflect on the smooth surface of the water beneath them.  A row of sirenflowers lifts their oddly shaped heads to the moonlight above.
